member.name: T:MediaBrowser.Model.Dlna.DeviceProfile
member.summary:
A represents a set of metadata which determines which content a certain device is able to play.
Specifically, it defines the supported containers and codecs (video and/or audio, including codec profiles and levels) the device is able to direct play (without transcoding or remuxing), as well as which containers/codecs to transcode to in case it isn't.

member.name: T:MediaBrowser.Model.Entities.PersonType
member.summary: Types of persons.

member.name: F:MediaBrowser.Model.Entities.PersonType.Actor
member.summary: A person whose profession is acting on the stage, in films, or on television.

member.name: F:MediaBrowser.Model.Entities.PersonType.Director
member.summary: A person who supervises the actors and other staff in a film, play, or similar production.

member.name: F:MediaBrowser.Model.Entities.PersonType.Composer
member.summary: A person who writes music, especially as a professional occupation.

member.name: F:MediaBrowser.Model.Entities.PersonType.Writer
member.summary: A writer of a book, article, or document. Can also be used as a generic term for music writer if there is a lack of specificity.

member.name: F:MediaBrowser.Model.Entities.PersonType.GuestStar
member.summary: A well-known actor or other performer who appears in a work in which they do not have a regular role.

member.name: F:MediaBrowser.Model.Entities.PersonType.Producer
member.summary: A person responsible for the financial and managerial aspects of the making of a film or broadcast or for staging a play, opera, etc.

member.name: F:MediaBrowser.Model.Entities.PersonType.Conductor
member.summary: A person who directs the performance of an orchestra or choir.

member.name: F:MediaBrowser.Model.Entities.PersonType.Lyricist
member.summary: A person who writes the words to a song or musical.

member.name: F:MediaBrowser.Model.Entities.PersonType.Arranger
member.summary: A person who adapts a musical composition for performance.

member.name: F:MediaBrowser.Model.Entities.PersonType.Engineer
member.summary: An audio engineer who performed a general engineering role.

member.name: F:MediaBrowser.Model.Entities.PersonType.Mixer
member.summary: An engineer responsible for using a mixing console to mix a recorded track into a single piece of music suitable for release.

member.name: F:MediaBrowser.Model.Entities.PersonType.Remixer
member.summary: A person who remixed a recording by taking one or more other tracks, substantially altering them and mixing them together with other material.
